content: *jack-o-lantern bag for trick-or-treating or a halloween decoration lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 80750ad skill level easy + level 3 lion® wool article #820 a 948 yards b 316 yards *pumpkin & ebony* *ed note if you are substituting another yarn it must be 100% feltable wool if you plan to felt the project * crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm split ring stitch markers bag is worked with 2 strands of yarn held together throughout pumpkin face color chart provided bag is worked in rounds handle is worked flat in row felt bag instructions provided sew handles to bag to finish see also 80751ad skull candy bag 1 *free registration at site required to access patterns * 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/skull-candy-bag
